message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $15,000 to start negotiations. What do you think?

Hi Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the value it brings, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product. Let me know if this is within your range.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? This product is truly worth it, and I'm willing to compromise to make this work.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. While I understand the value of the product, I'm still constrained by my budget. I'm willing to offer $12,000 for the product. I hope this meets your needs.
